heroSection.title: hey, i'm gergÃ¶
heroSection.introduction:
i am a javascript developer based in hungary.

i love to code and to learn new stuff.

i like dogs too.

responsibilities: Development of Customer Portal and calculators for employees and customers
Implementation of new features or modification of existing ones based on acceptance criteria defined in user stories
Development of end-to-end UI-tests and unit-tests
Enhancement of software performance through code refactoring
Continuous learning through detailed code reviews
Daily cooperation with backend developers, requirement engineers, business analysts and testers
Development of sales application for sales reps of Astra Zeneca, with emphasis on responsive design
Enhancement of software performance through code refactoring
Daily cooperation with an international team of developers and business analysts
Scripting of low-code software modules, used in bookkeeping software
Daily collaboration with a team of Hungarian engineers
Development and maintenance of organizational processes
Supervision of organizational unit in following areas: preparation of decision making, consulting

bootcampsAndCourses.title: Bootcamps, Courses, Continuous Learning
bootcampsAndCourses.description: Besides on the job trainings, I am regularly doing off the job courses on my own for my personal development. These courses thematize full stack projects, frontend frameworks, UI libraries, animations, databases, etc.
